tripleplay.platform

Interface NativeTextField


  • public interface NativeTextField
    Provides access to a platform-native text field, which can be overlaid onto a PlayN game, or TPUI interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  NativeTextField.Mode
      A native text field be in one of three modes.
      static interface  NativeTextField.Transformer 
      static interface  NativeTextField.Validator 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add()
      Adds the field to the view.
      react.Signal<Boolean> finishedEditing()
      A signal that is dispatched when the native text field has lost focus.
      void focus()
      Request focus for the native text field
      boolean hasFocus()
      Returns true if this native text field currently has focus.
      NativeTextField refreshMode(NativeTextField.Mode mode)
      Updates or creates a new native text field with the given mode.
      void remove()
      Removes the field from the view.
      NativeTextField setAutocapitalization(boolean useAutocapitalization)
      Configures the autocapitalization behavior of the field on a virtual keyboard.
      NativeTextField setAutocorrection(boolean useAutocorrection)
      Configures the autocorrection behavior of the field on a virtual keyboard.
      NativeTextField setBounds(pythagoras.f.IRectangle bounds)
      Configures the bounds of the native text field (in top-level screen coordinates).
      NativeTextField setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Sets the enabled state of the field.
      NativeTextField setFont(Font font)
      Configures the font used by the field to render text.
      NativeTextField setReturnKeyLabel(String label)
      Configures the label of the return key on virtual keyboards.
      NativeTextField setTextType(Keyboard.TextType type)
      Configures the type of text expected to be entered in this field.
      NativeTextField setTransformer(NativeTextField.Transformer transformer)
      Sets the transformer for use with this native field.
      NativeTextField setValidator(NativeTextField.Validator validator)
      Sets the validator for use with this native field.
      react.Value<String> text()
      The current value of the text field.

    • Method Detail

      • text

        react.Value<String> text()
        The current value of the text field.

      • finishedEditing

        react.Signal<Boolean> finishedEditing()
        A signal that is dispatched when the native text field has lost focus. Value is false if editing was canceled

      • setValidator

        NativeTextField setValidator(NativeTextField.Validator validator)
        Sets the validator for use with this native field.
        Returns:
        this for call chaining.

      • setTransformer

        NativeTextField setTransformer(NativeTextField.Transformer transformer)
        Sets the transformer for use with this native field.
        Returns:
        this for call chaining.

      • setTextType

        NativeTextField setTextType(Keyboard.TextType type)
        Configures the type of text expected to be entered in this field.
        Returns:
        this for call chaining.

      • setFont

        NativeTextField setFont(Font font)
        Configures the font used by the field to render text.
        Returns:
        this for call chaining.

      • setBounds

        NativeTextField setBounds(pythagoras.f.IRectangle bounds)
        Configures the bounds of the native text field (in top-level screen coordinates).
        Returns:
        this for call chaining.

      • setAutocapitalization

        NativeTextField setAutocapitalization(boolean useAutocapitalization)
        Configures the autocapitalization behavior of the field on a virtual keyboard.
        Returns:
        this for call chaining.

      • setAutocorrection

        NativeTextField setAutocorrection(boolean useAutocorrection)
        Configures the autocorrection behavior of the field on a virtual keyboard.
        Returns:
        this for call chaining.

      • setReturnKeyLabel

        NativeTextField setReturnKeyLabel(String label)
        Configures the label of the return key on virtual keyboards. Underlying platform is responsible for attempting to match this value as well as it is able. Null indicates platform default.
        Returns:
        this for call chaining.

      • setEnabled

        NativeTextField setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets the enabled state of the field.

      • refreshMode

        NativeTextField refreshMode(NativeTextField.Mode mode)
        Updates or creates a new native text field with the given mode. If a value != this is returned, the caller must then repopulate all the properties of the fields.

      • add

        void add()
        Adds the field to the view.

      • remove

        void remove()
        Removes the field from the view.

      • focus

        void focus()
        Request focus for the native text field

      • hasFocus

        boolean hasFocus()
        Returns true if this native text field currently has focus.
